Package mrbaxmypka.gmail.com.mapPointsTrimmer.xml

Class KmlHandler

java.lang.Object
mrbaxmypka.gmail.com.mapPointsTrimmer.xml.XmlHandler
mrbaxmypka.gmail.com.mapPointsTrimmer.xml.KmlHandler
@Component
public class KmlHandler
extends XmlHandler
Kml processing class based on the StAX xml-library.

    private void processImagesFromDescription​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> imgSrcFromDescription, java.util.List<org.w3c.dom.Node> attachmentNodes, org.w3c.dom.Node placemark, MultipartDto multipartDto)
    1) Compares the given List of images src from user description to the existing from from Locus xml. 1.1) If no presented, it will create a new and all the existing images src will be appended to if as the new . 2) Overwrites attachments data with data from srs if they have the same filenames as those from User description 2.1) Deletes those src from images list 3) If description contains more images src than the existing s, it will add additional elements to the parent.
    private void processLocusAttachments​(org.w3c.dom.Element documentRoot, MultipartDto multipartDto)
    1) Compares the given List of src to images from user description and an existing from of Locus xml. 2) Overwrites src in attachments if they have the same filenames as those from User description 3) If description contains more src to images than the existing has, it add additional elements to the parent.
    java.lang.String processXml​(java.io.InputStream kmlInputStream, MultipartDto multipartDto)
    All the additional information for a User (preview size, outdated descriptions etc) are placed inside the CDATA[[]] as an HTML markup.

  • Method Details

    • processXml

      public java.lang.String processXml​(java.io.InputStream kmlInputStream, MultipartDto multipartDto) throws java.io.IOException, javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException, org.xml.sax.SAXException, javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
      All the additional information for a User (preview size, outdated descriptions etc) are placed inside the CDATA[[]] as an HTML markup. So the main goal for this method is the extracting CDATA and pass it to the HTML parser.
      Specified by:
      processXml in class XmlHandler
      Parameters:
      kmlInputStream - An xml file (kml, gpx etc) as the InputStream from a given MultipartDto
      multipartDto - The main object to get data from.
      Returns:
      A fully processed xml string.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
      org.xml.sax.SAXException
      javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

    • processHref

      private void processHref​(org.w3c.dom.Element documentRoot, MultipartDto multipartDto)
      Every old href tag contains path to file and a filename. So here we derive an existing filename and append it to the new path.
      Parameters:
      documentRoot - RootElement with all the child Nodes from Document

    • processLocusAttachments

      private void processLocusAttachments​(org.w3c.dom.Element documentRoot, MultipartDto multipartDto)
      1) Compares the given List of src to images from user description and an existing from of Locus xml. 2) Overwrites src in attachments if they have the same filenames as those from User description 3) If description contains more src to images than the existing has, it add additional elements to the parent.

    • processImagesFromDescription

      private void processImagesFromDescription​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> imgSrcFromDescription, java.util.List<org.w3c.dom.Node> attachmentNodes, org.w3c.dom.Node placemark, MultipartDto multipartDto)
      1) Compares the given List of images src from user description to the existing from from Locus xml. 1.1) If no presented, it will create a new and all the existing images src will be appended to if as the new . 2) Overwrites attachments data with data from srs if they have the same filenames as those from User description 2.1) Deletes those src from images list 3) If description contains more images src than the existing s, it will add additional elements to the parent.
      Parameters:
      imgSrcFromDescription - A List of src to images from User Description
      attachmentNodes - (Linked)List of Node within parent, e.g.: to operate on (replace, remove, add). In the end all those ExtendedData will be written in the end of Placemark tag, e.g. <>... ...
      placemark - A Parent Node for adding a new if the last one is not presented.

    • getLocusSpecificAttachmentsHref

      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLocusSpecificAttachmentsHref​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> imagesToAttach, MultipartDto multipartDto)

    • getImagesSrcAsLcAttachments

      private java.util.List<org.w3c.dom.Element> getImagesSrcAsLcAttachments​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> imagesToAttach)
      Parameters:
      imagesToAttach - Src to images from User description
      Returns:
      XMLStreamConstants.CHARACTERS as src/to/image.img to be added to to Locus Map xml.

    • getNewExtendedData

      private org.w3c.dom.Node getNewExtendedData​(java.util.List<org.w3c.dom.Element> elementsToBeInside)
      Parameters:
      elementsToBeInside - All XMLEvent's to be written inside with Locus namespace.
      Returns:
      LinkedList with XMLEvents inside to be written into existing document as: ... xmlEventsToBeInside ...

    • prettyPrintCdataXml

      private java.lang.String prettyPrintCdataXml​(java.lang.String processedHtmlCdata, MultipartDto multipartDto)
      Just for pretty printing and mark out CDATA descriptions. If the whole XML document is inline except CDATA so as to emphasize that CDATA among XML this method add start and end lineBreaks.
